ActJudges Act
SubjectElizabeth Cormier ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Adrien J. Cormier
PrecisGranting of an annuity to ELIZABETH CORMIER, widow of the Honourable Adrien J. Cormier, Chief Justice of the Court of Queen's Bench of New Brunswick, effective July 6, 2010.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Elizabeth Cormier ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Adrien J. Cormier
precis: Granting of an annuity to ELIZABETH CORMIER, widow of the Honourable Adrien J. Cormier, Chief Justice of the Court of Queen's Bench of New Brunswick, effective July 6, 2010.
